subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: Bode Miller stayed aggressive and kept plowing through a snowstorm to win his first race of the new World Cup season in a time of 1 minute 46.15 seconds.
snippet: Bode Miller stayed aggressive and kept plowing through a snowstorm to win his first race of the new World Cup season in a time of 1 minute 46.15 seconds.
